title: User can create a new transfer from Player History
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND I am in the player history section
custom_steps: WHEN I select Transfer from the Create new menu
custom_expected: THEN a preliminary transfer will open

title: User can view existing transfer
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND I am in a player's Player History
AND there is a transfer transaction in a player's Player History
custom_steps: WHEN I click on the transfer
custom_expected: THEN the transfer will open in the same window.

title: User can only see options in create new dropdown that they have permission to see
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user with limited create permissions
AND I am in Player History
custom_steps: WHEN I go to click on the Create New button
custom_expected:
THEN the multi-level menu will appear
BUT not show “Transactions” or any of its sub-menus that I don't have permissions to see

title: User should be alerted if assignment date is before 3 days of current date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND in Assignment, Transfer
AND entered an assignment date 3 days before current date
custom_steps: WHEN I click "Submit"or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN the error message "Assignment date should be within 3 business days of submission. Please use the Comments field to explain the reason for the delay" will appear
AND the visible button will be “BACK”

title: User should be alerted if assignment date is after 3 days of current date and a comment has been added
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND in Assignment, Transfer
AND entered an assignment date 3 days before current date
custom_steps: WHEN I click "Submit"or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN the error message "Assignment date should be within 3 business days of submission. Please use the Comments field to explain the reason for the delay" will appear
AND the visible buttons will be “Ignore and Continue” or “Back”

title: Club should be prevented from initiating transfer from player that does not belong to that club
custom_preconds: You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization. If you believe you have received this message in error, please contact the BOC
custom_steps: WHEN selecting Create New, Assignment, “Transfer”
custom_expected: THEN error message will appear “You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization. If you believe you have received this message in error, please contact the BOC”

title: User should be prevented from transferring a player that does not have a valid MNC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND on a player’s Player History
AND player does not have an active MNC
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Create New” Assignment, Transfer of a Minor League Player
custom_expected: THEN error message appears “This transaction may only be performed on a player with an active Minor League Contract”

title: User should be alerted if player being transferred is not active or is currently on option
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND player’s current or pending minor league roster status is not “ACTIVE” or on “Option”
custom_steps: WHEN submitting a transfer
custom_expected:
THEN error message will appear “Player is not active in the minors or is on option” and see “Back” button 
BUT if logged in as BOC will have “Ignore and continue” option as well as “Back”

title: User should be alerted if player is being transffered to VSL/DSL and was subject to R4
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND the player is a US player subject to draft
custom_steps: WHEN transferring to DSL/VSL
custom_expected: THEN error message will appear “Rule 4 eligible players cannot be signed or transferred to DSL or VSL clubs”

title: Selecting a "transfer to" club should highlight the salary level the player requires
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a player is being transferred
AND player is missing a valid salary for the selected level of play for the corresponding season
custom_steps: WHEN selecting a value for the “Transfer To” field
custom_expected: THEN under the Addendum C field the system will display following message in red “The Player needs a valid Addendum C at the level of play he's being transferred to.”

title: User should be prompted to create add C is player requires one for a transaction between March 15th and Rule 5 Draft System Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am transferring a player
AND the transaction date is between March 15th (Tendered Add C system date) and the Rule Draft system date
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" or "Approve”
custom_expected:
THEN an error message will appear "Player is missing a salary in his Addendum C for his new level of play. Return to the transfer and click "Create New Addendum C" to correct this. The new C will not be reflected on this form."
AND BOC users only will have the option to Ignore and Continue or go Back

title: User should be prompted to create add C is player requires one for a transaction after Rule 5 Draft System Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am transferring a player
AND the transaction date is after the Rule 5 Draft system date
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" or "Approve”
custom_expected:
THEN an error message will appear "Player does not yet have a salary in his Addendum C for his new level of play. Please ensure one is created before the start of the next season."
AND all Users will have the option to Ignore and Continue or go Back

title: BOC should be stopped if they attempt to reverse a transfer that is not players mot recent approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND I am in a transfer that is not the player’s most recent approved transaction
custom_steps: WHEN I click "Reverse" or "Reverse and Suppress”
custom_expected: THEN an error message will appear "Only the player's latest approved transaction can be reversed."

title: BOC should be stopped if they attempt to reverse a release that is not players most recent approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND I am in a release that is not the player’s most recent approved transaction
custom_steps: WHEN I click “Reverse" or "Reverse and Suppress”
custom_expected: THEN an error message will appear "Only the player's latest approved transaction can be reversed."

title: User should be alerted if designation date is not within 3 business days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND on the Transfer of a Minor League Player
AND the Assignment Date is 3 days before or after the current date
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Approve”
custom_expected:
THEN error message will appear “Assignment date should be within 3 business days of submission. 
Please use the Comments field to explain the reason for the delay.”
BUT if there is a comment in the comments field user can “Ignore and Continue”

title: User should be alerted if assignment date of transfer is btwn MJ and MNR reserve list/R5 date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND in a player’s Transfer of a Minor League Player
AND assignment date of transfer is on or between the MJ or MN reserve list date and rule 5 draft date
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Submit” or “Approve”
custom_expected:
THEN error message will appear “A player cannot be assigned between the reserve list filing date and the end of the Rule 5 draft."
BUT a BOC user will have the option to “Ignore and Continue” or “Back”

title: User should be alerted if player is not transferring to a AA or AAA club and is SGNXT
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND transferring a player not to a AA or AAA club
AND current or pending MLR status is “Signed for Next Year”
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN the error message will appear "<Last name>, <Roster name> is one of your allowable 12 players who is signed for next year"
AND all users will have the option “Ignore and Continue” or “Back”

title: User should be alerted if player is transferring to a AA or AAA club and is SGNXT
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND transferring a player to a AA or AAA Club
AND current or pending MLR status is “Signed for Next Year”
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN the error message will appear "When player is signed for next year, he cannot be transferred to a AA or AAA club"
BUT BOC users only, will have the option “Ignore and Continue” or “Back”

title: User should receieve a warning if under control limit will be violated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND on the Transfer of a Minor League Player
AND the Club’s maxed under control limit
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" or "Approve”
custom_expected: THEN warning message appears "<Club Name>, will exceed the reserve list limit.  Limit: <Limit#> Actual: <Actual#>"

title: User should be alerted if they are transferring a player to a lower level too close to end of season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am transferring a player to a lower level
AND the assignment date is in the last 20 days before the “Last day of season”
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" only
custom_expected: THEN a message will appear "<Last Name>, <Roster name> is being sent to a lower level of play during the last 20 days of the season and must be approved by Minor League Baseball"

title: BOC Can see flags when rules fail
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND there are flgs on a submitted transfer
custom_steps: WHEN clicking on the flag icon
custom_expected: THEN flags icon opens a popover with the flags that are currently set for the form

title: BOC receives notification if assignmdate date is in the last 20 days before last day of season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am signed in as a BOC user
AND a transfer transaction with a status of “Submitted to BOC”
custom_steps: WHEN going to notifications clipboard
custom_expected:
THEN user should see a notification with a description “Player is being sent to a lower level of play during the last 20 days of the season”
AND the user should be able to click on it to open the transaction in view mode

title: User is alerted if the designation date for FADML precedes certain transcation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND a designation date is created before the player’s most recent transaction that is not a waiver, re-affiliation or tender
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Approve”
custom_expected: THEN a message will appear "A transaction cannot be scheduled before the date of <Roster Name, Last Name>'s latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>"

title: User is alerted if assignment date precedes certain transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND a assignment date is created before the player’s most recent transaction that is not a waiver, re-affiliation or tender
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN a message will appear "A transaction cannot be scheduled before the date of <Last Name, Roster Name>'s latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>"

title: User can view players addendum C while creating or viewing a transfer
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as a user
custom_steps: WHEN loading a transfer transaction
custom_expected:
THEN the system will display the player’s Tendered, Pending Approval or Approved Addendum C's for the player for the year = the Assignment Date year if it is before the Rule 5 Draft
BUT if it's after the Rule 5 Draft date, use the following year
AND if no date has been entered use the current date

title: System should calculate and display the active count for each club in MNR
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as a user
custom_steps: WHEN in the Rosters Widget
custom_expected:
THEN I can see the system has calculated and displayed the active count for each club in the MNR
AND all players in a MNR status of Active, Pending Active, or Suspended by League / BOC will count toward a Club's active roster count

title: User can set the active limit for each level of play
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as an admin user
custom_steps: WHEN I contact IT to adjust the active limit for a level of play
custom_expected: THEN when I go to check the values will have changed

title: User can set the under control limit for level of play
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as an admin user
custom_steps: WHEN I contact IT to adjust the under control limit for each level of play
custom_expected: THEN when I go to check it the values changed

title: BOC can see flag if player is on IL or DL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND a player is on IL or DL and being submitted for transfer
custom_steps: WHEN clicking on flags icon in the Approvals clipboard
custom_expected: THEN the flag will open a popover and read "Player is on Inactive or Disabled List"

title: User should receive an error if player being released is on Inactive List (IL)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND I have picked a player to release that’s pending Roster Status is one of the following statuses Military, Suspended (both SUS and SMN), Disabled List (7DL, 7RH, 60D, 60R), Temp Inactive, Ineligible, Disqualified, Restricted
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Submit” or “Approve”
custom_expected: THEN the following error message will appear “This assignment may not be requested for players on Military, Suspended, Disqualified, Disabled, Temporarily Inactive, Restricted, or Ineligible Lists.  Player must be reinstated first." "Minor League Roster Status: <MN Status>.  Pending Minor League Roster Status: <Pending MN Status>."

title: User can select what item to perform advanced search for
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND on the Advanced Search widget
custom_steps: WHEN changing the “Search For” dropdown and refreshing the screen
custom_expected:
THEN the available filters for each “Search For” option updates
AND it clears all previous filters.

title: User can perform search for transactions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND on the Advanced Search widget
custom_steps:
WHEN selecting a “Transaction” in the “Search For”
AND adding one or more filters
AND clicking “Search”
custom_expected:
THEN run a search according to the selected criteria and return a result set
BUT if a user does not have permission to open a transaction, it should not be returned in the results.

title: User should receieve error message if player being transferred is a MJ player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND I have a Major League Player
AND I am on “Transfer a Minor League Player” transaction
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Submit” or “Approve”
custom_expected: THEN the error message will appear "This is a Minor League transaction but the player is playing at the Major League."

title: Release Permissions General
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND a release transaction has had its permissions set to that user
custom_steps: WHEN I view the transfer with its own permissions set
custom_expected: THEN I can view, edit, approve, reject, reverse, or suppress anywhere in the system

title: Release Permissions Club - MN - Admin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a Club user with Admin permissions
AND there is a release transaction that matches the “From Org”
AND the transaction is both from and to a minor league club
custom_steps: WHEN trying to view and print the transaction
custom_expected:
THEN I should be able to view and print
BUT not if the transaction has been moved to a suppressed state
AND then I cannot see the “BOC Notes” field
AND then I can edit or change the transaction

title: Release Permissions Club - MN - Basic
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a Club user with Basic permissions
AND there is a release transaction that matches the “From Org”
AND the transaction is both from and to a minor league club
custom_steps: WHEN trying to view and print the transaction
custom_expected:
THEN I should be able to view and print
BUT not if the transaction has been moved to a suppressed state
AND then I cannot edit or change the transaction
AND then I cannot see the “BOC Notes” field

title: Release Permissions - BOC MN Admin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am signed in as a BOC admin user
AND there is a Release
custom_steps: WHEN interacting with any release transaction
custom_expected:
THEN I can view and print the transfer
AND I can View all flags and attachments in all states
AND I can create, delete, edit, and submit any release of a Minor League player
AND I can approve, reject, reverse and suppress any release and see associated flags

title: Release Permissions - BOC MN Basic
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am signed in as a BOC basic user
AND there is a Release
custom_steps: WHEN interacting with any release transaction
custom_expected:
THEN I can view and print all MNR releases
AND can view all flags and attachments in all states

title: Transfer permissions General
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND a transfer transaction has had its permissions set to that user
custom_steps: WHEN I view the transfer with its own permissions set
custom_expected: THEN I can view, edit, approve, reject, reverse, or suppress anywhere in the system

title: Transfer Club MN Admin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a Club user with Admin permissions
AND there is a transfer transaction that matches the “From Org”
AND the transaction is both from and to a minor league club
custom_steps: WHEN trying to view and print the transaction
custom_expected:
THEN I should be able to view and print
BUT not if the transaction has been moved to a suppressed state
AND then I cannot see the “BOC Notes” field
AND then I can edit or change the transaction

title: Transfer - Club MN Basic
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a Club user with Basic permissions
AND there is a transfer transaction that matches the “From Org”
AND the transaction is both from and to a minor league club
custom_steps: WHEN trying to view and print the transaction
custom_expected:
THEN I should be able to view and print
BUT not if the transaction has been moved to a suppressed state
AND then I cannot edit or change the transaction
AND then I cannot see the “BOC Notes” field

title: Transfer BOC MN Admin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am signed in as a BOC admin user
AND there is a Transfer
custom_steps: WHEN interacting with any transfer transaction
custom_expected:
THEN I can view and print the transfer
AND I can View all flags and attachments in all states
AND I can create, delete, edit, and submit any release of a Minor League player
AND I can approve, reject, reverse and suppress any release and see associated flags

title: Transfer BOC MN Basic
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am signed in as a BOC admin user
AND there is a Transfer
custom_steps: WHEN interacting with any transfer transaction
custom_expected:
THEN I can view and print all MNR transfers
AND can view all flags and attachments in all states

title: Declare FA General
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND a Declare Free Agent transaction has had its permissions set to that user
custom_steps: WHEN I view the DFA with its own permissions set
custom_expected: THEN I can view, edit, approve, reject, reverse, or suppress anywhere in the system

title: Declare FA - BOC MN Admin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am signed in as a BOC admin user
AND there is a DFA
custom_steps: WHEN interacting with any DFA transaction
custom_expected:
THEN I can view and print the transfer
AND I can View all flags and attachments in all states
AND I can create, delete, edit, and submit any release of a Minor League player
AND I can approve, reject, reverse and suppress any release and see associated flags

title: Declare FA BOC MN Basic
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am signed in as a BOC basic user
AND there is a DFA
custom_steps: WHEN interacting with any DFA transaction
custom_expected:
THEN I can view and print all MNR releases
AND can view all flags and attachments in all states

title: User can save a transfer transaction for a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND I am on a transfer transaction
custom_steps: WHEN I click Save
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status will be set to “Preliminary”
But if it’s not the first time the transaction is being saved then the status will not change

title: Submitting a transfer should post transaction to players history
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND I am submitting a transfer to the BOC
custom_steps: WHEN I click submit
custom_expected: THEN the transfer transaction has been successfully submitted, system creates an entry in Player's Player History: Code = TRANS, Description = Transfer to be in green font

title: User can cancel creation of or changes to transfer
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND I am in edit mode for a transfer
AND I have made changes to the form
custom_steps: WHEN I hit the “Cancel” button
custom_expected:
THEN I will be prompted with a warning “Are you sure you want to Cancel? You will lose any unsaved changes. This is a permanent action that cannot be undone.”
AND then the form will reload into view mode, with none of the edits that were made

title: User can submit a transfer to BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND I have a transfer created
AND the Submit to BOC button is available
custom_steps: WHEN I click Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN the system will update the status of the transaction to “Submitted to BOC”
AND the system will reload the transaction into view mode
AND submit notification will be displayed “the transaction has successfully been submitted” in blue

title: User can edit a transfer as a Club user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a Club user
AND I am in a Transfer in view mode
custom_steps: WHEN I click “Edit”
custom_expected:
THEN the form will reload in edit mode
AND the Edit button will be replaced by the save button
AND the form is in any state other than Preliminary or Rejected, I can only attach new files. 
BUT I cannot edit existing attachments or any other part of transaction.

title: User can edit a transfer as a BOC user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND I am in a Transfer in view mode
custom_steps: WHEN I click “Edit”
custom_expected:
THEN the form will reload in edit mode
And the Edit button will be replaced by the save button
AND I am able to edit all fields in all states except for Approved, Suppressed and Reversed transactions
BUT if in Approved, Reversed and Suppressed, I can attach new files or edit existing attachments
AND I can update "Comments" and "BOC Notes" fields

title: User can close a transfer
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND I am on a transfer form in view mode
custom_steps: WHEN I click “Close”
custom_expected: THEN I will return to the previous screen prior to entering view mode

title: User can delete a transfer
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND I am in Edit mode for a transfer
AND the form is in Preliminary and Rejected states
custom_steps: WHEN I click the “Delete” button
custom_expected:
THEN the warning will appear “Are you sure you want to delete this [form]? ("Form" to be replaced with transaction type) This is a permanent action that cannot be undone.”
AND if yes is clicked the form will close and no record will be kept
BUT if no is clicked the user will return to the form and no action will be taken

title: User can edit a release as a Club user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a Club user
AND I am in a Release in view mode
custom_steps: WHEN I click “Edit”
custom_expected:
THEN the form will reload in edit mode
AND the Edit button will be replaced by the save button
AND the form is in any state other than Preliminary or Rejected, I can only attach new files. 
BUT I cannot edit existing attachments or any other part of transaction.

title: User can edit a release as a BOC user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND I am in a Release in view mode
custom_steps: WHEN I click “Edit”
custom_expected:
THEN the form will reload in edit mode
And the Edit button will be replaced by the save button
AND I am able to edit all fields in all states except for Approved, Suppressed and Reversed transactions
BUT if in Approved, Reversed and Suppressed, I can attach new files or edit existing attachments
AND I can update "Comments" and "BOC Notes" fields

title: User can delete a release
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND I am in Edit mode for a release
AND the form is in Preliminary and Rejected states
custom_steps: WHEN I click the “Delete” button
custom_expected:
THEN the warning will appear “Are you sure you want to delete this [form]? ("Form" to be replaced with transaction type) This is a permanent action that cannot be undone.”
AND if yes is clicked the form will close and no record will be kept
BUT a message will appear "Release of Minor League player deleted"
BUT if no is clicked the user will return to the form and no action will be taken

title: User can close a release
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND I am on a release form in view mode
custom_steps: WHEN I click “Close”
custom_expected: THEN I will return to the previous screen prior to entering view mode

title: Submitting a transfer to BOC will update a players pending ORG and club and roster status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND I am submitting a transfer
custom_steps: WHEN click submit
custom_expected:
THEN the system sets the player’s pending org and the club to the destination/target org and club from the transaction
AND the system sets the player’s pending minor league roster status to “Active” if the player’s minor league roster status is “Signed For Next Year”, and his level of play is either AA or AAA.

title: BOC can edit an existing declare free agent transaction (FA)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND there is an existing FADML
custom_steps: WHEN I click “Edit” in view mode
custom_expected:
THEN the form will reload in edit mode
AND Save will replace the Edit button
AND I will be able to edit all fields in all states except Approved and Reversed
BUT in Approved and Reversed, I will have access to attach new files or edit existing attachments
AND can update "Comments" and "BOC Notes" fields

title: BOC can open the profile associated with a submitted transfer from the Approvals clipboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC approver
AND there is a submitted transfer in the Approvals clipboard
custom_steps: WHEN I click on the players name hyperlink
custom_expected:
THEN the player profile will open in the same window/tab
AND be defaulted to the Player History tab

title: BOC can receive an approval item when transfer is submitted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND a Transfer has reached the status of “Submitted to BOC”
custom_steps: WHEN I look at the BOC - Minor Transactions - Admin's Approvals widget
custom_expected:
THEN the Transfer will display
AND if a Notice of Disposition label is attached it will display
AND be available for download from the Attachments column
AND if there are comments they will display in the comments column

title: BOC can open the submitted transfer from the approvals clipboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND there is a submitted Transfer in my Approvals clipboard
custom_steps: WHEN I click on the “Type” hyperlink
custom_expected: THEN type hyperlink of a submitted transfer transaction will open the submitted transfer transaction in view mode in the same window/tab

title: BOC Can reverse a transfer
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND in view or edit mode for a transfer in the Approved state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Reverse”
custom_expected: THEN the Current Status is updated to “Reversed”

title: When BOC suppresses a reversed tx, remove any notifications associated with it
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN I suppress a transfer
custom_expected: THEN any notifications that exist for the transfer will be removed from all users’ notifications widgets

title: BOC Can reject a transfer tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND in a Transfer transaction status is “Submitted”
custom_steps: WHEN I click “Reject”
custom_expected:
THEN the transfer transaction status is updated to “Rejected”
AND players Pending org and club will be reversed
AND pending Major and Minor league status will be reversed
AND the item will be removed from the approvals clipboard

title: When tx is approved/rejected/reversed, club should get notified
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a Club user
AND there is a transaction “Submitted to BOC” waiting for approval
custom_steps:
WHEN the BOC approves/rejects/ or reverses a transaction
BUT does not suppress
custom_expected: THEN the club will receive a notification when the transaction is updated

title: BOC Can suppress a reversed transfer tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND I have a transfer transaction in a Reversed state
custom_steps: WHEN click the “Suppress” on a reversed transaction
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction is suppressed
AND hidden from the player’s Player History, Searches, and any other place on the UI
AND any notifications that exist for the transaction will be removed from all users' notification widgets

title: BOC Can approve a transfer
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND I a transfer transaction state is Preliminary, “Submitted to BOC”, or Rejected
custom_steps: WHEN I click “Approve”
custom_expected: THEN the transaction status is updated to “Approved”

title: Player names in MN Roster should link to player profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a player in the MN Roster widget
custom_steps: WHEN I click on the hyperlink of the player’s name
custom_expected: THEN launch the player profile in the same window/tab and default to the Player History tab of the profile.

title: CLub should see the MN Roster widget default to their org
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as a Club user
custom_steps: WHEN in the MN Roster widget
custom_expected: THEN the filter will default to the AAA Club for my Org

title: Players who are Pending Active should display in green on MNR widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the MN Roster widget
custom_steps: WHEN player with a MN Roster Status of Pending Active
custom_expected:
THEN will appear in Global Green text
AND every column for the player’s row that does not contain a hyperlink or an icon should display Global Green text

title: User can view the Minor League Roster widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as a user
custom_steps: WHEN I click on the MNR widget
custom_expected: THEN the HOME MNR League Roster widget will be visible

title: Players with a MJ Roster status of "Optioned" should appear in BOLD font
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as a user
custom_steps: WHEN in the MNR widget
custom_expected: THEN players with a MJ Roster status of Optioned should appear in Bold font

title: User can create new transaction from MNR
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND I am on the MN Roster widget
custom_steps: WHEN I click “Create New” to the left of the player’s name
custom_expected:
THEN a multi-level menu will launch
AND selecting any available option should launch a new preliminary transaction

title: Players with certain roster statuses should appear on roster but not count towards Active/Under Control
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player with a certain MN Roster Status, 60 Day DL, Military Leave, Reinstated from IL, or Signed for Next Year
custom_steps: WHEN on the MN Roster Widget
custom_expected:
THEN the status should be on the MN Roster Widget
BUT should not count towards the Club’s Active or Under Control Limit

title: User can view declare FA tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on a player’s Player History
AND there is a declare free agent transaction
custom_steps: WHEN clicking on a declare free agent transaction
custom_expected: THEN the declare free agent transaction will open in the same window

title: BOC can create declare FA tx from Player History
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND I am on a player’s Player History
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Create New” in the multi-level selection, selecting Free Agency, Declare Minor League Free Agent
custom_expected: THEN the Declare Free agent form should open

title: Club should have declare FA greyed out in dropdown
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as a club user
custom_steps: WHEN I click on “Create New” button on the Player History widget
custom_expected:
THEN Declare Minor League Free Agent should be greyed out
AND clicking on it will not trigger any action

title: User will be prevented from initiating declare FA tx for a player that does not have valid MNC
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am selecting a “Declare a Minor League Free Agent”
custom_steps: WHEN a player does not have a minor contract in one of the designated states
custom_expected: THEN an error message will appear "This transaction may only be performed on a player with an active Minor League Contract."

title: User can close declare FA tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am in view mode of a declare free agent transaction
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the “Close” button
custom_expected: THEN I the FADTX will close

title: User can cancel creation or changes to declare FA
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am in a FADML tx in edit mode
AND I have made changes
custom_steps: WHEN I click “Cancel”
custom_expected:
THEN the form should be closed and no record should be kept.
AND I should be returned to the previous entry point of the transaction

title: User can delete a declare FA tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND I am in view or edit mode of a FADML tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Delete”
custom_expected: THEN the form should be closed and no record should be kept

title: User can save declare FA tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am in edit mode of a FADML tx
AND I have made changes
custom_steps: WHEN I click “Save”
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction will be set to “preliminary”
AND the system will display a successful save blue notification

title: BOC Can approve a declare FA tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND in view or edit mode of FADML tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Approve”
custom_expected:
THEN Update Player's Player History with: Code = FADML, Description = Declared a Minor League Free Agent in black text
AND sets MJR or MNR status to “Free Agent”

title: User should be stopped if they attempt to reverse FADML tx if that is not players most recent approved tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged on as a BOC user
AND in a FADML tx that is not the player’s most recent approved transaction
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Reverse” or "Reverse and Suppress"
custom_expected: THEN an error message will appear "Only the player's latest approved transaction can be reversed."

title: BOC can reverse a declare MNR FA tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND in view or edit mode of a FADML in the approved state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Reverse”
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status is updated to “Reversed”
AND reversed notification is displayed

title: Approving a declare FA tx should update players org and club
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN I successfully approve FADML
custom_expected: THEN the system sets the player’s org and club to null

title: BOC can suppress a reversed declare free agent transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND a FADML has been approved
custom_steps: WHEN click the “Suppress” on a reversed transaction
custom_expected:
THEN THEN the transaction is suppressed
AND hidden from the player’s Player History, Searches, and any other place on the UI
AND any notifications that exist for the transaction will be removed from all users' notification widgets

title: Players who have held certain roster statuses for 2 years shouldnt appear on MNR
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has held a roster status Disqualified, Ineligible, Restricted, or Voluntarily Retired for two consecutive years
custom_steps: WHEN on the MN Roster widget
custom_expected: THEN they should be removed from the MN Roster and no longer be visible

title: User should receieve error if player attempting to declare FA is a MJ player
custom_preconds: GIVEN I have a player who is a MJ player
custom_steps: WHEN attempting to declare a free agent
custom_expected: THEN an error will appear "This is a Minor League transaction but the player is playing at the Major League."
